laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Proposita A adapted to poor organification by increasing deiodinase activities in the goiter, avoiding hypothyroidism. FT4 levels remained low or low-normal despite increasing doses of L-thyroxine.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Increasing daily doses were provided (25, 50, 75, and 100 /H9262g)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: FT4 levels remained low or low-normal despite the increasing doses.

laboratory_examinations.findings: High iodine uptake with low efflux leading to iodine retention in T-PS2 cells.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Iodide retention was higher in T-PS2 cells than in normal NT cells. T-PS2 cells showed a progressive increase in intracellular iodide levels.
